description: A neural network for segmenting and processing Lorentz TEM images of skyrmion lattices. This software based on U-Net architecture is capable of identifying skyrmions in out-of-focus Lorentz TEM images based on training data. This isspecifically useful for analyzing large area data from in-situ experiments.
name: SkX_NN: Neural Network for skyrmion identification in Lorentz TEM
